adHeader: Planning a Wedding/Party - Bay Area Website of Locations & Services
adDetails: Planning a Wedding, a Birthday, Bar-Mitzvah or a Fundraiser? Check out the Best Bay Area only directory of Event Sites, locations, services & vendors. http://www.BayArea-Weddings.com Extensive lists of Bay Area reception hall, venues, Djs, Photographers, Videographers, Caterers, Florists, Bakeries, Ceremony sites. Officiants, Disc Jockeys, Wedding Music Songs lists, Wedding planners and coordinators, etc. Separate list for San Francisco, East Bay, North Bay, Marin, Sonoma, Napa, Peninsula, & San Mateo Counties.
